citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 PM on
09/08/2014.
The licensee was unavailable due to a previously scheduled appointment.
